body_html:
I am not convinced that making this change will degrade performance dramatically. I hope you can give me an example to convince me.
The data transfer speed among CPU and GPUs varies depends on how fast the hardware technology evolves. Everyone knows that data transfer between CPU and GPUs is costly, but when someone do call function in this way, torch.cuda.set_device(-1), we assume he knows what he is doing.

body:
I am not convinced that making this change will degrade performance dramatically. I hope you can give me an example to convince me.
The data transfer speed among CPU and GPUs varies depends on how fast the hardware technology evolves. Everyone knows that data transfer between CPU and GPUs is costly, but when someone do call function in this way, `torch.cuda.set_device(-1)`, we assume he knows what he is doing.
